mapper.sql: select q.data_id, q.biz_data_id, q.biz_id, q.normal_flag, q.flow_status, q.remark, q.price1, q.price2, q.price3, q.price4, q.price5, q.price6, q.price7, q.price8, q.price9, q.price10, q.string1, q.string2, q.string3, q.string4, q.string5, q.string6, q.string7, q.string8, q.string9, q.string10, q.string11, q.string12, q.string13, q.string14, q.string15, q.string16, q.string17, q.string18, q.string19, q.string20, q.string21,q.string22,q.string23,q.string24,q.string25,q.string26,q.string27,q.string28,q.string29,q.string30, q.price11, q.price12, q.price13, q.price14, q.price15, q.price16, q.price17, q.price18, q.price19, q.price20, q.datetime1, q.datetime2, q.datetime3, q.datetime4, q.datetime5, q.status, q.del_flag, q.create_by, q.create_time, q.update_by, q.update_time, q.except_pay_time,q.purchase_specific_requests, dt1.dept_name as deptName from biz_process_data q left join sys_dept dt1 on q.string22=dt1.dept_id

select q.data_id, q.biz_data_id, q.biz_id, q.normal_flag, q.flow_status, q.remark, q.price1, q.price2, q.price3, q.price4, q.price5, q.price6, q.price7, q.price8, q.price9, q.price10, q.string1, q.string2, q.string3, q.string4, q.string5, q.string6, q.string7, q.string8, q.string9, q.string10, q.string11, q.string12, q.string13, q.string14, q.string15, q.string16, q.string17, q.string18, q.string19, q.string20, q.string21,q.string22,q.string23,q.string24,q.string25,q.string26,q.string27,q.string28,q.string29,q.string30, q.price11, q.price12, q.price13, q.price14, q.price15, q.price16, q.price17, q.price18, q.price19, q.price20, q.datetime1, q.datetime2, q.datetime3, q.datetime4, q.datetime5, q.status, q.del_flag, q.create_by, q.create_time, q.update_by, q.update_time, q.except_pay_time,q.purchase_specific_requests, dt1.dept_name as deptName from biz_process_data q left join sys_dept dt1 on q.string22=dt1.dept_id left join biz_data_status ds on q.data_id = ds.string4 left join biz_process_child pc on q.data_id = pc.data_id join `biz_data_status` bs on pc.child_id = bs.`child_id`

select distinct q.data_id, q.biz_data_id, q.biz_id, q.normal_flag, q.flow_status, q.remark, q.price1, q.price2, q.price3, q.price4, q.price5, q.price6, q.price7, q.price8, q.price9, q.price10, q.string1, q.string2, q.string3, q.string4, q.string5, q.string6, q.string7, q.string8, q.string9, q.string10, q.string11, q.string12, q.string13, q.string14, q.string15, q.string16, q.string17, q.string18, q.string19, q.string20, q.datetime1, q.datetime2, q.datetime3, q.datetime4, q.datetime5, q.status, q.del_flag, q.create_by, q.create_time, q.update_by, q.update_time,ct.name as customerName,bs.name as suppliersName, q.string21,q.string22,q.string23,q.string24,q.string25,q.string26,q.string27,q.string28,q.string29,q.string30, q.price11, q.price12, q.price13, q.price14, q.price15, q.price16, q.price17, q.price18, q.price19, q.price20, dt1.dept_name as deptName,u.user_name as createByName,q.except_pay_time,q.purchase_specific_requests from biz_process_data q left join sys_user u on q.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id
left join biz_data_status ds on ds.string3=q.data_id
left join biz_customer ct on ct.customer_id=q.string2 left join biz_suppliers bs on bs.suppliers_id=q.string3 left join sys_dept dt1 on q.string22=dt1.dept_id

select distinct q.data_id, q.biz_data_id, q.biz_id, q.normal_flag, q.flow_status, q.remark, q.price1, q.price2, q.price3, q.price4, q.price5, q.price6, q.price7, q.price8, q.price9, q.price10, q.string1, q.string2, q.string3, q.string4, q.string5, q.string6, q.string7, q.string8, q.string9, q.string10, q.string11, q.string12, q.string13, q.string14, q.string15, q.string16, q.string17, q.string18, q.string19, q.string20, q.datetime1, q.datetime2, q.datetime3, q.datetime4, q.datetime5, q.status, q.del_flag, q.create_by, q.create_time, q.update_by, q.update_time,ct.name as customerName,bs.name as suppliersName, q.string21,q.string22,q.string23,q.string24,q.string25,q.string26,q.string27,q.string28,q.string29,q.string30, q.price11, q.price12, q.price13, q.price14, q.price15, q.price16, q.price17, q.price18, q.price19, q.price20, q.except_pay_time,q.purchase_specific_requests, ifnull(sum(bc.amount),0) as billAmount from biz_process_data q left join sys_user u on q.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id
left join biz_customer ct on ct.customer_id=q.string2 left join biz_suppliers bs on bs.suppliers_id=q.string3
left join biz_bill_contract bc on bc.data_id=q.data_id

select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time,u.user_name as createByName,d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests from biz_process_data d left join sys_user u on d.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id

select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time,u.user_name as createByName,d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests from biz_process_data d left join sys_user u on d.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id

select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time,u.user_name as createByName,d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests from biz_process_data d left join sys_user u on d.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id

select d.datetime1 pDate1, d.string1 pString1,d.string2 pString2,d.string3 pString3,d.string5 pString5,d.string6 pString6, c.child_id childId,c.data_id dataId,c.string1,c.string2,c.string3,c.string4,c.string5,c.string6,c.string7,c.string8,c.string9, c.string10,c.price1,c.price2,c.datetime1,c.datetime2,c.datetime3,c.datetime4,u.user_name as createByName from biz_process_child c left join biz_process_data d on c.data_id=d.data_id left join sys_user u on d.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id

select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.string21,d.string22,d.string23,d.string24,d.string25,d.string26,d.string27,d.string28,d.string29,d.string30, d.price11, d.price12, d.price13, d.price14, d.price15, d.price16, d.price17, d.price18, d.price19, d.price20, d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests, u.user_name as createByName,de.dept_name as deptName
from biz_process_data d left join sys_dept de on de.dept_id = d.string6 left join sys_user u on u.user_id=d.create_by left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id

select * from (select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.string21,d.string22,d.string23,d.string24,d.string25,d.string26,d.string27,d.string28,d.string29,d.string30, d.price11, d.price12, d.price13, d.price14, d.price15, d.price16, d.price17, d.price18, d.price19, d.price20, d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests, ((COALESCE(sum(ss.num),0)-ifnull(sn1.cn1,0) - ifnull(sn1.cn2,0))) as stayNum, s.name as supplierName from biz_process_data d left join biz_data_steststay ss on ss.string4=d.data_id and ss.num > 0 and ss.string1='0' left join biz_suppliers s on s.suppliers_id=d.string6 left join (select sn.string4, COALESCE(sum(sn.string1),0) cn1,COALESCE(sum(sn.string2),0) cn2 from biz_data_stestn sn group by sn.string4) sn1 on sn1.string4=d.data_id group by d.data_id ) d

select * from (select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.string21,d.string22,d.string23,d.string24,d.string25,d.string26,d.string27,d.string28,d.string29,d.string30, d.price11, d.price12, d.price13, d.price14, d.price15, d.price16, d.price17, d.price18, d.price19, d.price20, d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests, s.name as supplierName from biz_process_data d left join biz_suppliers s on s.suppliers_id=d.string6 group by d.data_id ) d

select d.data_id, d.biz_data_id, d.biz_id, d.normal_flag, d.flow_status, d.remark, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.price4, d.price5, d.price6, d.price7, d.price8, d.price9, d.price10, d.string1, d.string2, d.string3, d.string4, d.string5, d.string6, d.string7, d.string8, d.string9, d.string10, d.string11, d.string12, d.string13, d.string14, d.string15, d.string16, d.string17, d.string18, d.string19, d.string20, d.datetime1, d.datetime2, d.datetime3, d.datetime4, d.datetime5, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.string21,d.string22,d.string23,d.string24,d.string25,d.string26,d.string27,d.string28,d.string29,d.string30, d.price11, d.price12, d.price13, d.price14, d.price15, d.price16, d.price17, d.price18, d.price19, d.price20, d.except_pay_time,d.purchase_specific_requests, u.user_name as createByName,de.dept_name as deptName,de1.dept_name as deptName1
from biz_process_data d left join sys_dept de on de.dept_id = d.string1 left join sys_dept de1 on de1.dept_id = d.string10 left join sys_user u on u.user_id=d.create_by left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_process_data
biz_data_id, biz_id, normal_flag, flow_status, remark, price1, price2, price3, price4, price5, price6, price7, price8, price9, price10,
price11, price12, price13, price14, price15, price16, price17, price18, price19, price20,
string1, string2, string3, string4, string5, string6, string7, string8, string9, string10, string11, string12, string13, string14, string15, string16, string17, string18, string19, string20,
string21, string22, string23, string24, string25, string26, string27, string28, string29, string30,
datetime1, datetime2, datetime3, datetime4, datetime5, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, except_pay_time, purchase_specific_requests,
#{bizDataId}, #{bizId}, #{normalFlag}, #{flowStatus}, #{remark}, #{price1}, #{price2}, #{price3}, #{price4}, #{price5}, #{price6}, #{price7}, #{price8}, #{price9}, #{price10},
#{price11}, #{price12}, #{price13}, #{price14}, #{price15}, #{price16}, #{price17}, #{price18}, #{price19}, #{price20},
#{string1}, #{string2}, #{string3}, #{string4}, #{string5}, #{string6}, #{string7}, #{string8}, #{string9}, #{string10}, #{string11}, #{string12}, #{string13}, #{string14}, #{string15}, #{string16}, #{string17}, #{string18}, #{string19}, #{string20},
#{string21}, #{string22}, #{string23}, #{string24}, #{string25}, #{string26}, #{string27}, #{string28}, #{string29}, #{string30},
#{datetime1}, #{datetime2}, #{datetime3}, #{datetime4}, #{datetime5}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{exceptPayTime}, #{purchaseSpecificRequests},
mapper.update:
update biz_process_data
biz_data_id = #{bizDataId}, biz_id = #{bizId}, normal_flag = #{normalFlag}, flow_status = #{flowStatus}, remark = #{remark}, price1 = #{price1}, price2 = #{price2}, price3 = #{price3}, price4 = #{price4}, price5 = #{price5}, price6 = #{price6}, price7 = #{price7}, price8 = #{price8}, price9 = #{price9}, price10 = #{price10},
price11 = #{price11}, price12 = #{price12}, price13 = #{price13}, price14 = #{price14}, price15 = #{price15}, price16 = #{price16}, price17 = #{price17}, price18 = #{price18}, price19 = #{price19}, price20 = #{price20},
string1 = #{string1}, string2 = #{string2}, string3 = #{string3}, string4 = #{string4}, string5 = #{string5}, string6 = #{string6}, string7 = #{string7}, string8 = #{string8}, string9 = #{string9}, string10 = #{string10}, string11 = #{string11}, string12 = #{string12}, string13 = #{string13}, string14 = #{string14}, string15 = #{string15}, string16 = #{string16}, string17 = #{string17}, string18 = #{string18}, string19 = #{string19}, string20 = #{string20},
string21 = #{string21}, string22 = #{string22}, string23 = #{string23}, string24 = #{string24}, string25 = #{string25}, string26 = #{string26}, string27 = #{string27}, string28 = #{string28}, string29 = #{string29}, string30 = #{string30},
datetime1 = #{datetime1}, datetime2 = #{datetime2}, datetime3 = #{datetime3}, datetime4 = #{datetime4}, datetime5 = #{datetime5}, status = #{status}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, except_pay_time = #{exceptPayTime}, purchase_specific_requests = #{purchaseSpecificRequests},
where data_id = #{dataId}
mapper.delete:
delete from biz_process_data where data_id in
#{dataId}
mapper.select: SELECT (max(CONVERT(right(string12,3),UNSIGNED INTEGER)) + 1) as fileNumber FROM biz_process_data where string12 like concat('PO-',date_format(now(), '%Y%m'), '%')
